Title: Lowers quorum requirements for meetings of community boards held by videoconferencing
Summary: Provides for a quorum of one quarter of the members and the presiding officer of a community board physically be present at a location where the public can attend for such board to conduct videoconferencing.
LawCode: Amd ยง103-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to lowering quorum requirements for meetings of community boards held by videoconferencing
